attributes.action: Provide a cooked school dinner for all school children under 16 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An increasing number of school children are deprived the right to basic nutrition with increasing malnutrition levels in the U.K.

All children should have a right to healthy cooked school dinners paid for by the Government.  Stop passing billions of pounds to the banks and start investing in our future.
